credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Design for Hebrew Characters
medium: Brush and gold paint, black ink,  white gouache on tan paper
description: Design uses the Hebrew Characters "Shin," painted 5 times across and 6 times down.  Characters partly obliterated by splattered black ink and white gouache.
name: Drawing
